title: Clark
description: This is the unbelievable story of Clark Olofsson, the controversial criminal who inspired the term "Stockholm syndrome." Based on his truths and lies.

title: Blackfish
description: They're hunted, herded and forced to dance. Meet a 15,000-pound slave -- on the edge of a psychotic break.

title: Jimmy Savile: A British Horror Story
description: This 2022 documentary series set in the UK features DJ and broadcaster Jimmy Savile in archival footage.

title: Hold Tight
description: When a young man goes missing soon after his friend dies, life in a tight-knit, affluent Warsaw suburb slowly unravels, exposing secrets and lies. This engrossing thriller series is based on the Harlan Coben novel of the same name.

title: Archive 81
description: An archivist takes a job restoring damaged videotapes and gets pulled into the vortex of a mystery involving the missing director and a demonic cult.

title: 13 Commandments
description: Thou shalt not kill. But thou can mete out poetic justice with maximum cruelty -- if thou is a vicious serial attacker.

title: Ouija
description: When their friend mysteriously dies, grieving teens seek connection via an antique ouija board that conjures up a nightmare from the other side.

title: Brokeback Mountain
description: Their love was forbidden. Their passion was real. Their torment took them through a lifetime of joy and bitterness.

title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
description: He's disturbed, brilliant and obsessed with creating the ultimate fragrance. No matter what the cost.

title: Stranger Things
description: This eerie homage to '80s classics boasts a "Spielbergian sense of wonder and a John Hughes-like knack for underage anthropology" (The New Yorker).

title: The Stranger
description: A stranger approaches Adam Price with a disturbing allegation about his wife, Corinne. Meanwhile, detectives Johanna and Wes take on a bizarre case.

title: Scream
description: Memories of a town's dark past are stirred when a group of teens become suspects, targets and victims of a killer who’s out for blood.

title: The Valhalla Murders
description: An Oslo detective with a painful past returns to his native Iceland to help a dedicated cop hunt a serial killer with a link to a mysterious photo.

title: The Woods
description: In 1994, a summer camp reels from a brutal crime. Twenty-five years later, the police seek prosecutor Paweł Kopiński's help identifying a murder victim.

title: The Haunting of Bly Manor
description: Dead doesn't mean gone. An au pair plunges into an abyss of chilling secrets in this gothic romance from the creator of "The Haunting of Hill House."

title: You
description: After learning a bitter truth, a chef joins his best friend and restaurant partner in a culinary competition in Cancún to reignite his zest for life.

title: Elite
description: Another school year, another intriguing mystery. At Las Encinas, it's not about what grade you get, but what crime you solve.

title: Ratched
description: Nurse Mildred Ratched seeks employment at Lucia State Hospital as it prepares to admit a new psychiatric patient: notorious killer Edmund Tolleson.

title: How to Get Away With Murder
description: A law professor gives her students a shot at some real-world cases. Too bad that includes embroiling them in murder.

title: Life After Death with Tyler Henry
description: With 300,000 people on his waiting list, medium Tyler Henry shares his famed gift around the US while uncovering family secrets in this docuseries.

title: Requiem
description: Why do black mirrors and a little girl's face terrify her? The voices in the woods might know the answer.

title: Tabula Rasa
description: Mie, who has amnesia, finds herself in a locked psych ward, where a detective questions her about the recent disappearance of a man she was seen with.

title: Light the Night
description: This 2021 drama thriller series features Ruby Lin, Tony Yang and Cheryl Yang.

title: Black Mirror
description: The sleek world of tomorrow offers opportunities beyond our wildest dreams. At a price out of our worst nightmares.

title: Behind Her Eyes
description: A spilled drink at a bar leads to an awkward day at work for Louise, who's shaken again by night terrors. David introduces Adele to his new colleagues.

title: The Ripper
description: In the 1970s, the brutal murders of sex workers in economically depressed areas of the UK spark little public interest — until a teen is also killed.

title: Reset
description: A deadly bus crash leaves a college student and a games designer in a time loop. Based on a novel.

title: Making a Murderer
description: Filmed for over a decade, this gripping story of crime, corruption and murder won four Emmys, including Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series.

title: Arcane
description: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

title: Seven
description: When good and evil collide, it will take a special warrior to intervene. And he'll need to hone his exorcism skills.

title: Tiger King
description: Watched by more than 34 million in the US in its first 10 days of release, this stranger-than-fiction documentary was a pop culture sensation in 2020.

title: Money Heist
description: This critically acclaimed series, praised by Film Daily as "the most addictive show on TV," won Best Drama at the International Emmys and the Premios Fénix.

title: Dirty John
description: When love becomes twisted, and trust turns into manipulation, anything can happen — including murder — in this true-crime anthology series.

title: Mr. Hiiragi’s Homeroom
description: Days before graduation, an unassuming teacher takes his class hostage: he's determined to confront the truth about their classmate who died by suicide.

title: Haunted
description: Real people. Real stories. Really scary. The things they've seen are horrible ... and continue to haunt them.

title: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer
description: A series of murders, rapes and kidnappings baffles police until detectives Gil Carrillo and Frank Salerno team up and start connecting the crimes.

title: The End of the F***ing World
description: This comedy-drama series based on the graphic novel by Charles Forsman features Alex Lawther and Jessica Barden.

title: After Life
description: This darkly comedic drama series about a widower struggling with the meaning of life was created by and stars Ricky Gervais.

title: The Victims' Game
description: A man is torn between justice and fatherly love. And he must find the perpetrators before they become the next victims.

title: Orphan
description: Kate and John Coleman adopt 9-year-old Esther from an orphanage, but it doesn't take long for Kate to see through Esther's angelic façade.

title: Gone for Good
description: When his girlfriend suddenly disappears, a man races to unravel a maddening web of clues — and begins to uncover long-buried secrets from his own past.

title: Gone Girl
description: His marriage crumbling, Nick comes home one day to find his wife has vanished. And as the police turn up the heat, shocking truths come to light.

title: Into the Night
description: This apocalyptic sci-fi thriller series features Pauline Etienne and Laurent Capelluto.

title: F is for Family
description: Bill Burr channels his 1970s childhood and his flair for comic rants into a raucous family sitcom co-starring Laura Dern, Justin Long and Sam Rockwell.

title: Perfume
description: He's disturbed, brilliant and obsessed with creating the ultimate fragrance. No matter what the cost.

title: Parasite
description: A family of have-nots latch onto a chance to thrive off a family of haves. But in truth, leeching goes both ways.

title: The Exorcist
description: Is a little girl still just a little girl if a demon lurks inside her? Two priests pray the answer is "yes."

title: Locke & Key
description: While Nina uncovers details about Rendell's past, Kinsey helps out the Savini Squad, Tyler falls in with a bad crowd, and Bode finds another key.

title: The Game
description: An aloof investment banker's life spirals into peril and paranoia after his brother gives him an odd birthday gift: the chance to play a mysterious game.

title: Exhibit A
description: This true crime series shows how innocent people have been convicted with dubious forensic techniques and tools such as touch DNA and cadaver dogs.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: Sent to an orphanage at age 9, Beth develops an uncanny knack for chess — and a growing dependence on the green tranquilizers given to the children.

title: Riverdale
description: A campy teen melodrama with biting humor, this modern-day take on the characters of Archie Comics is "an enjoyable and moody teen series,” says Slate.

title: A Brighter Summer Day
description: In 1960s Taiwan, a teenage boy and the girl he loves confront gang violence, cultural upheaval and their own mutable sense of identity.

title: Insidious: Chapter 3
description: When psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to help a teen contact her deceased mother, she unwittingly unleashes a demon that torments the girl.

title: The Women and the Murderer
description: This documentary traces the capture of serial killer Guy Georges through the tireless work of two women: a police chief and a victim's mother.

title: Collateral
description: A hunt in L.A. begins when a cabbie picks up a deadly passenger. You won't want to be on their list of stops.

title: House of Wax
description: A group of friends making their way to a college football game fall prey to two bloodthirsty brothers in an abandoned small town.

title: The Spy
description: In the 1960s, Israeli clerk-turned-secret agent Eli Cohen goes deep undercover inside Syria on a perilous, years-long mission to spy for Mossad.

title: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
description: On her way to meet his parents, something isn't right. Not with her boyfriend, or his family, or her own fragmenting reality.

title: Fight Club
description: Dissatisfied with life? Try something different -- and a bit brutal. Just never forget the first rule of Fight Club ...

title: The Bridge Curse
description: A group of university students decides to test an urban legend about the ghost of a female student that haunts a campus bridge.

title: The Fearless
description: A reborn triad man with an ability to see the dead teams up with a forensic expert to solve mysterious crimes.

title: Formosa 1867
description: This series reconstructs the history of the fatal Rover Incident in 1867 when the U.S. sent a military expedition to investigate a shipwreck in Taiwan.

title: Close Your Eyes Before It’s Dark
description: While vacationing at a mountain cabin, a group of longtime friends uncovers an old scandal that could have deadly consequences.

title: Inside the World’s Toughest Prisons
description: These prisons are quagmires of violence and misery. Two fearless journalists dare to go behind bars anyway.

title: American Murder: The Family Next Door
description: Using raw, firsthand footage, this documentary examines the disappearance of Shanann Watts and her children, and the terrible events that followed.

title: The Invisible Guest
description: After waking next to his now-dead lover in a hotel room, a young businessman hires a prominent lawyer to figure out how he ended up a murder suspect.

title: Tell Me Who I Am
description: After a twin loses his memory, his brother gifts him with an idyllic childhood. But the truth can’t be hidden forever.

title: Osmosis
description: In near-future Paris, two brilliant siblings unveil a high-tech implant designed to pair up soul mates. But the beta test yields unwelcome surprises.

title: Evil Genius: the True Story of America's Most Diabolical Bank Heist
description: A bank robbery in Pennsylvania ends in the bombing death of a pizza deliveryman who may or may not have been a hostage forced to commit the crime.

title: It's Kind of a Funny Story
description: A teenager in crisis checks into a psych ward but does he belong there? A bearded stranger may have all the answers.

title: Fear Street Part 1: 1994
description: Chat rooms, mix tapes, murders at the mall. A killer '90s soundtrack fuels this throwback horror flick packed with slasher kills and jump-scare thrills.

title: Dead Silence
description: In the face of terror, staying quiet is nearly impossible. But if she hears you ... you'll never say another word.

title: This Is Pop
description: Uncover the real stories behind your favorite pop songs as this docuseries charts the impact of the festival scene, Auto-Tune, boy bands and more.

title: Gold Leaf
description: In 1949, the only daughter of Taiwan's largest tea exporter decides take charge of the indebted business rather than handing everything over to a man.

title: The Tag-Along: The Devil Fish
description: Two students team up with a medium after accidentally catching a demon fish and releasing evil spirits into the world. Based on a Taiwanese urban legend.

title: Annabelle Comes Home
description: A devilish doll presides over a haunted house of horrors, awakening evil spirits in the home of two demonologists and terrorizing their young daughter.

title: Totally Spies!
description: These clever girls aren't just shopaholic teens. After school, they're agents for a secret organization where villains run amok and cool gadgets rule!

title: Memento
description: Suffering short-term memory loss after a head injury, Leonard Shelby embarks on a grim quest to find the lowlife who murdered his wife.

title: Oats Studios
description: Director Neill Blomkamp produces a series of experimental short films that envision post-apocalyptic worlds and nightmarish scenarios.

title: Hollywood
description: While waiting for his big break, aspiring movie star Jack Castello accepts a job at a local service station that pumps more than just gas.

title: Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich
description: Survivors recount how Epstein abused, manipulated and silenced them as he ran a so-called molestation "pyramid scheme" out of his Palm Beach mansion.

title: Panic Room
description: A woman and her daughter are caught in a game of cat-and-mouse with burglars in their New York City home and are forced to retreat inside a vault.

title: Biohackers
description: A gifted medical student searching for answers. A pioneering doctor playing God. Experimenting with the truth can be deadly.

title: Animal
description: This immersive series follows the world's most magnificent creatures, capturing never-before-seen moments from the heartwarming to the outrageous.

title: Red Notice
description: An FBI profiler pursuing the world's most wanted art thief becomes his reluctant partner in crime to catch an elusive crook who's always one step ahead.

title: The Power of the Dog
description: Filmmaker Jane Campion's "exquisitely crafted" drama starring Benedict Cumberbatch is "driven by transfixing performances," raves The Hollywood Reporter.

title: Making Fun
description: Grumpy expert maker Jimmy DiResta fields kids' ideas for delightfully pointless inventions. Then — if he's in the mood — he and his pals build 'em.

title: The Falls
description: After having to quarantine together during COVID-19, a mother and daughter are forced to confront their personal obstacles and relationship tensions.

title: Canine Intervention
description: No dog, no breed, no behavior is unfixable for Cali K9's Jas Leverette. Follow the Oakland dog trainer as he works with a range of canines and owners.

title: I AM A KILLER: RELEASED
description: In this crime docuseries spinoff, a convict is paroled 30 years after being sentenced to death for murder. Then he makes a stunning confession.

title: The Midnight Gospel
description: His curiosity's as cosmic as the mind. And it's fed by a wild universe, home to intelligent beings who have stories to share.

title: The Privilege
description: After stumbling upon a bizarre ritual in his family home, a tormented teen begins to suspect that his affluent parents have an ugly secret.

title: Halston
description: His name built an empire. His style defined an era. American fashion designer Halston skyrockets to fame before his life starts to spin out of control.

title: Special
description: People have always seen him as different. But one big accident and one little lie are about to change everything.

title: Mirage
description: When a caring nurse alters the past to save a life, her present reality shifts to a new timeline — one without her beloved daughter.

title: Long Shot
description: When Juan Catalan is arrested for a murder he didn't commit, he builds his case for innocence around raw footage from a popular TV show. A documentary.

title: Cam
description: After a look-alike takes over her account, a cam girl with a growing fan base sets out to identify the mysterious culprit and reclaim her own identity.

title: Explained
description: With topical issues, bite-sized episodes and celebrity narrators, this documentary series from Vox delivers useful information with a fresh, fun spin.

title: A Classic Horror Story
description: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.
Coveting his intractable wife's land, he commits an unspeakable crime and inherits it all. Still, a price must be paid.

title: The Toys That Made Us
description: Star Wars. Barbie. G.I. Joe. Learn how your favorite toys came to life -- and conquered the world.

title: The Paramedic
description: A freak accident. An unhinged mind. Nothing is off the table when it comes to keeping his beloved close. Really close.

title: History of Swear Words
description: We're not supposed to say them — but we always do. Get a crash course on history's filthiest, funniest words.

title: The Lost Daughter
description: A professor in her 40s travels to a Greek isle to relax, read and occasionally flirt. But the arrival of a young mother sends her into an uneasy spiral.

title: How to Become a Tyrant
description: This 2021 political documentary series about despots is narrated by Peter Dinklage.

title: Man in Love
description: When he meets a debt-ridden woman who's caring for her ailing father, a debt collector with a heart of gold sets out to win her love.

title: The Turning
description: Ghosts, curses, possession and evil children. They didn't mention any of this in her job interview.

title: Have a Good Trip: Adventures in Psychedelics
description: Altered states. Bad decisions. Naughty acorns. Stars offer up a vivid dose of their best, worst and weirdest trips.

title: Icarus
description: In his Oscar-winning film, an American cyclist plunges into a vast doping scandal involving a Russian scientist -- Putin's most-wanted whistleblower.

title: A Sun
description: A grisly act. A broken family. A tragic loss. The past's unforgiving rays illuminate the road to redemption and acceptance.

title: Citrus
description: Rebellious Yuzu hopes to finally get a boyfriend, but instead she finds herself growing curiously attracted to her stern new stepsister.

title: Fear Street Part 2: 1978
description: Terrifying visions. Buried secrets. And so much blood. The mystery of Sarah Fier's curse deepens as a group of camp counselors try to stop a killer.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: Amy Adams leads an all-star cast including Julianne Moore, Anthony Mackie, Wyatt Russell and Gary Oldman in this immersive psychological thriller.

title: Interior Design Masters
description: Aspiring interior designers transform a variety of spaces from dowdy to delightful as they vie for a life-changing contract with a top London hotel.

title: Dancing on Glass
description: This 2022 psychological drama features María Pedraza and is directed by Jota Linares.

title: Fear Street Part 3: 1666
description: Dark secrets. Unspeakable evil. The merciless world of 1666 holds the truth behind the curse — and the key to Shadyside’s future.

title: Surviving Death
description: The Guardian hails this series as building “a convincing and provocative case that our consciousness can and does continue beyond life as we know it."

title: November 13: Attack on Paris
description: It began as a night of celebration -- and ended in devastation. An intimate look at a city's humanity, loss and resilience.

title: Cadaver
description: When a peculiar hotel dinner show draws crowds during a postapocalyptic famine, one family discovers they'll pay much more than the price of admission.

title: History 101
description: Quick hits of history answer humanity's biggest questions: How did we get here? And where are we going next?

title: More than Blue: The Series
description: In this series based on the movie, a man with a terminal illness seeks to help his beloved find a long-term partner.

title: Gatao 2: Rise of the King
description: When a zealous gang leader plans to take out a friend-turned-rival for control of his turf, internal tensions complicate the battle to be the boss.

title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

title: Hate the Sin, Love the Sinner
description: Love, loyalty and a life-altering decision. If they can't change the past, can they change the truth?

title: World's Most Wanted
description: Suspected of heinous crimes, they’ve avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. A docuseries profiling the world’s most wanted.

title: Disenchantment
description: Lonely Zøg searches the forest for his true love, Ursula the Bear, who's got a secret. Elfo, Luci and Bean stumble upon the site of an ancient battle.

title: Gypsy
description: A therapist walks a tightrope between suburban life and her New York City practice when she entangles herself in the private affairs of her patients.

title: Neymar: The Perfect Chaos
description: From his childhood in Praia Grande to his playing days with Santos and the National Team, follow Neymar's journey from Brazil to international stardom.

title: Eat Pray Love
description: From Italy to India to Bali, one writer searches for meaning. But how far do you have to go to find yourself?

title: Tear Along the Dotted Line
description: A cartoonist in Rome with his armadillo-for-a-conscience reflects on his path in life and a would-be love as he and his friends travel outside the city.

title: Diagnosis
description: Unsolved medical mysteries. Global wisdom. New hope. When the whole world's reading, the right diagnosis can come from anyone and anywhere.

title: On Children
description: Hostage to test scores. Tyrannized by motherly attention. Their lives are no longer their own -- and they must measure up.

title: The Politician
description: Ruthless rivals. Sordid scandals. Backstabbing and betrayal. High school is the perfect training for a life in politics.

title: Cat People
description: Cat people come in all shapes and sizes, but they share a love for their enchanting, unique feline friends. This docuseries reveals their tales.

title: The Boys in the Band
description: At a birthday party in 1968 New York, a surprise guest and a drunken game leave seven gay friends reckoning with unspoken feelings and buried truths.

title: A Tale Dark & Grimm
description: A bestselling book comes to life in this delightfully twisted tale that goes way beyond Hansel and Gretel and the witch with the candy-covered house.

title: The Curse of La Llorona
description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a troubled single mother discovers some folktales are true when a dark entity with sinister intentions pursues her children.

title: Heaven on the 4th Floor
description: At a massage parlor tucked away on the fourth floor of an apartment building, a Tuina practitioner brings clients both physical and emotional healing.

title: Death to 2021
description: This darkly comedic retrospective mixes real news footage and scripted talking-head interviews as it sends up the year that tried to one-up 2020.

title: Abstract: The Art of Design
description: Step inside the minds of the most innovative designers in a variety of disciplines and learn how design impacts every aspect of life.

title: Secrets of the Saqqara Tomb
description: After unearthing a tomb that had been untouched for 4,400 years, Egyptian archaeologists attempt to decipher the history of the extraordinary find.

title: Pet Stars
description: Follow talent management company Pets on Q as they work with the biggest animal influencers on social media in this reality series.

title: The World's Most Extraordinary Homes
description: Award-winning architect Piers Taylor and actress/property enthusiast Caroline Quentin travel the world touring beautifully unconventional homes.

title: Til Death Do Us Part
description: Bizarre time loops. Feline trouble. An unstoppable spot. Welcome to a twilit world of both dreams and nightmares.

title: Pui Pui Molcar
description: They’re guinea pigs! And they’re cars! The fuzzy and adorable molcars have lots of fun adventures in this delightful stop-motion animation.

title: High Score
description: This docuseries traces the history of classic video games, featuring insights from the innovators who brought these worlds and characters to life.

title: Trolls
description: When their fellow Trolls are captured by hungry Bergens, upbeat Princess Poppy and her grouchy pal Branch embark on the adventure of a lifetime.

title: Art&Tech
description: Explore the intersection of art and technology as each episode introduces a new contemporary artist and gets a closer look at their innovative methods.

title: The Surgeon's Cut
description: They’re philosophers, storytellers and pioneers in their fields. Four surgeons reflect on their lives and professions in this inspiring docuseries.

title: Be Alive Just Like You
description: A man with paraplegia and a destitute young woman begin an unusual romance, desperately seeking connection amid the harsh realities of their lives.

title: Enola Holmes
description: Her mother? Vanished. Her brothers, Sherlock and Mycroft? Vexing. To solve this mystery, she'll go it alone. The game is afoot.

title: I Lost My Body
description: A young love blossoms. A lost hand embarks on a perilous journey. And a dreamlike adventure unfolds in the streets of Paris.

title: Easy
description: This eclectic, star-studded anthology follows diverse Chicagoans fumbling through the modern maze of love, sex, technology and culture.

title: Attack of the Hollywood Clichés!
description: One-man armies, meet-cutes, casual strolls away from huge explosions — stars and industry insiders toast and roast these cinematic chestnuts and more.

title: Dear Tenant
description: A man looking after his deceased partner's mother and son becomes entangled in a bitter legal battle with the child's uncle.

title: Lead Me Home
description: Poignant stories of homelessness on the West Coast of the US frame this cinematic portrait of a surging humanitarian crisis.

title: Gaga: Five Foot Two
description: She's an artist and icon who pours her heart into her work. An intimate look at her life, beyond the glitter and glam.

title: Mystery Lab
description: Host Felipe Castanhari explores science, history, mysteries and marvels, uncovering mind-blowing facts with help from his lab buddies.

title: Amensalism
description: A man who can foresee others' deaths teams up with a lawyer to seek answers to their murky, intertwined pasts and save lives.

title: The Mind, Explained
description: Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.

title: Buried by the Bernards
description: Death isn't just a part of life — it's a business. And at R. Bernard Funeral Services, business is never boring.

title: The Social Dilemma
description: This social media exposé premiered at Sundance, winning a pair of Emmys with five additional nominations.

title: Gatao - The Last Stray
description: Romance unexpectedly blossoms when a freelance photographer arrives late to her assignment at a full moon celebration thrown for a mob boss's newborn.

title: The Forest of Love: Deep Cut
description: Nothing's as it seems when a charismatic conman and an aspiring film crew delve into the lives of two emotionally scarred women.

title: Beyond Stranger Things
description: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Shawn Levy and the Duffer Brothers sit down to discuss new characters and the season's most important themes.

title: Death to 2020
description: A year whose story couldn't be told until now, because it was still happening. The creators of "Black Mirror" look back at 2020 with an all-star cast.

title: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space
description: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space mission.

title: Derren Brown: The Push
description: Mentalist Derren Brown engineers an audacious social experiment demonstrating how manipulation can lead an ordinary person to commit an appalling act.

title: Made You Look: A True Story About Fake Art
description: A woman walks into a New York gallery with a cache of unknown masterworks. Thus begins a story of art world greed, willfulness and a high-stakes con.

title: Badla
description: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired -- but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

title: Derren Brown: Sacrifice
description: A master manipulator. A daring social experiment. How far can one man be pushed to save a stranger?

title: The Body
description: Mind games and mystery abound as a detective investigates the disappearance of a woman’s body from a morgue in this Hindi remake of a Spanish thriller.

title: Animals on the Loose: A You vs. Wild Movie
description: A lion running free. A baboon in need of rescue. Bear needs your help more than ever to be a hero — and get out alive — in this interactive adventure.

title: Minimalism: A Documentary About the Important Things
description: People dedicated to rejecting the American ideal that things bring happiness are interviewed in this documentary showing the virtues of less is more.

title: Holidate
description: All they want is someone to drunk-mock strangers with on holidays. No pressure. No romance. No chance it'll lead to love.

title: Derren Brown: Miracle
description: Illusionist Derren Brown reinvents the concept of "faith healing” through a series of stunts that debunk the confines of fear, pain and disbelief.

title: Words Bubble Up Like Soda Pop
description: After meeting one bright, sunny day, a shy boy who expresses himself through haiku and a bubbly but self-conscious girl share a brief, magical summer.

title: Whose Vote Counts, Explained
description: All people are created equal, but what about all voters? The facts of this basic American right may not be as self-evident.

title: Ride or Die
description: She commits a terrible act for the woman she loves. Now it’s them against the world, and there’s no turning back.

title: Coronavirus, Explained
description: In 2020, the world changed. This topical series examines the coronavirus pandemic, the efforts to combat it and ways to manage its mental health toll.

title: Newness
description: A new couple tries to keep monogamy interesting. But the lure of online hookups could be too much to resist.

title: Deep
description: He's an ex-con trying to do right. But when his son gets taken from him, breaking the law is the least of his problems.

title: Slasher
description: Rampaging serial killers leave carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive in this horror anthology series.

title: Is It Cake?
description: These bakers are the real deal when it comes to serving up fakes, from handbags to hamburgers to luggage that looks amazing — and tastes even better.

title: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes
description: John Wayne Gacy becomes a prime suspect in teen Robert Piest’s disappearance. Previously unheard audio tapes reveal Gacy’s thoughts and early days.

title: The Movies That Made Us
description: We laughed. We cried. We found ourselves at the movies, changed. Now go behind the scenes of these must-see pictures.

title: Catching Killers
description: A terrifying Kansas serial killer reemerges after 30 years. Using DNA technology and help from the media, investigators race to prevent another murder.

title: Sex Education
description: Despite the ministrations of sex therapist mom Jean and encouragement from pal Eric, Otis worries that he can't get it on. He's not the only one.

title: Adventure Beast
description: This adult animated comedy series features and is executive produced by Bradley Trevor Greive.

title: I AM A KILLER
description: Death row inmates convicted of capital murder give firsthand accounts of their crimes in this documentary series.

title: Monsters Inside: The 24 Faces of Billy Milligan
description: True crime fans will find themselves engrossed in this dark and disturbing case, one of the first to invoke a multiple personality disorder defense.

title: Bake Squad
description: The bakers pack the fun and flair into an edible play space, a colossal chocolate dragon egg and other showstoppers for two boys’ joint birthday fest.

title: Worst Roommate Ever
description: A woman known as Dorothea Puente runs a boarding house for those less fortunate, but her seeming benevolence belies motives that are much darker.

title: 100 Humans
description: One hundred hardy souls from diverse backgrounds participate in playful experiments exploring age, sex, happiness and other aspects of being human.

title: PIECES OF HER
description: Andy's 30th birthday lunch is interrupted by a shocking act of violence. After her mom's stunning response goes viral, a threat emerges in their home.

title: Baking Impossible
description: For their final mission, the bakineers build tasty bridges that must survive multiple stress tests. The judges select the winning team.

title: The Innocent
description: At a club, Mat is dragged into a brawl and his life alters forever when he accidentally kills a man. Years later, happiness finally seems within reach.

title: I missed you: Director's Cut
description: A workaholic reconnects with two men she blocked on social media five years ago and begins to reflect on her past life choices.

title: Headspace Guide to Sleep
description: Getting too much sleep or too little? Shun caffeine or workouts? Explore the biggest myths about sleep, and then learn an easy wind-down technique.

title: The Motive
description: In 1986, police discover a grisly crime scene: a family shot in their beds at point-blank range. The mystery deepens when a sole survivor appears.

title: School of Chocolate
description: The chefs create edible illusions, including a planter box with earthy flavors, then form teams to bend chocolate into architectural shapes.

title: The Staircase
description: Following his wife's suspicious death, Michael Peterson speaks about his version of the events while lawyers and expert witnesses prepare for trial.

title: The Raincoat Killer: Chasing a Predator in Korea
description: Violent killings target wealthy victims around the city. Matching footprints found at each scene suggest a serial murderer on the loose.

title: The Sons of Sam: A Descent into Darkness
description: In August 1977, the arrest of David Berkowitz ended New York City's wave of terror. But journalist Maury Terry believed there was more to the story.

title: Lupin
description: Years after a tragic injustice, Assane seeks to settle a score — and a debt — by stealing a diamond necklace, but the heist takes an unexpected turn.

title: John of God: The Crimes of a Spiritual Healer
description: Revered for his "miracles." Reviled for his crimes. One psychic had all the power — until brave survivors proved theirs.

title: One of Us Is Lying
description: School's in session as blogger Simon gets set to expose his classmates' deepest secrets. Then a death in detention turns up the heat on four students.

title: The Chestnut Man
description: Thulin and her reluctant new partner, Hess, investigate a gruesome murder. Politician Rosa Hartung returns to work after her daughter's disappearance.

title: Elize Matsunaga: Once Upon a Crime
description: On a temporary release from prison, Elize details her troubled relationship with Marcos as people close to the case describe the aftermath of the crime.

title: Don't F**k with Cats: Hunting an Internet Killer
description: A shocking online video brings together a widespread internet group of animal lovers out for justice. Their target, meanwhile, has more horrors planned.

title: The Boys in the Band: Something Personal
description: Decades after his play first put gay life center stage, Mart Crowley joins the cast and crew of the 2020 film to reflect on the story's enduring legacy.

title: Murder Among the Mormons
description: Three lethal explosions rattle Salt Lake City in 1985 and expose a dark underbelly of religious-document dealing.

title: Clickbait
description: How well do you really know the person you love the most? And would you still love them if the world was saying that the version you knew was a lie?

title: Crime Stories: India Detectives
description: When a stabbing incident kills a mother and leaves her son gravely injured, Bengaluru police trace the steps and the motives of their unusual suspect.

title: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths
description: News of 11 family members found dead in their home sparks a local and national frenzy. Perplexed investigators grapple with more questions than answers.

title: Dear Ex
description: A teen navigates a bitter feud between his willful mom and a free-spirited man, who's the lover and insurance beneficiary of his recently deceased dad.

title: The Keepers
description: Two former students launch a dogged investigation into the cold case of Sister Catherine Cesnik, a nun who was slain in Baltimore in 1969.

title: Unabomber - In His Own Words
description: As his infamy grows, Ted Kaczynski finds his footing as a serial bomber while authorities desperately search for a pattern with his earliest targets.

title: Spotless
description: When his estranged brother Martin resurfaces, crime scene cleaning company owner Jean is pulled into a dangerous world of mobsters and dark secrets.

title: Connected
description: Ever feel like you're being watched? Well, you may be right. Latif explores the sometimes cute, often creepy ways surveillance pervades our lives.

title: Safe
description: When his teenage daughter doesn't return home after a party, Tom Delaney anxiously combs the neighborhood and learns her boyfriend is also missing.

title: Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed
description: Bob Ross brought joy to millions as the world’s most famous art instructor. But a battle for his business empire cast a shadow over his happy trees.

title: The Prom
description: They canceled prom just to keep her out. But now the dance is getting a big Broadway makeover — and everyone's invited.

title: Hypnotic
description: Concentrate on the light. Feel the weight of your body. Relinquish control. And let the deadly mind games begin.

title: Inside the Criminal Mind
description: Criminal profilers and neurological experts weigh in on what drives serial killers and whether certain people are predisposed to murder.

title: The Butterfly Effect
description: A haunted youth learns how to change his terrible past. But the truth he finds might not be what he wants.

title: Paprika
description: Reality and the dream world are on a collision course after a device that can record dreams is stolen from a psychiatric research facility.

title: Criminal: Spain
description: When detectives interrogate Isabel, she talks about love, sex and her Dalmatian, forcing Chief Inspector María to take a risk to try and solve a murder.

title: Someone Has to Die
description: In conservative 1950s Spain, the alleged relationship between a young man and a Mexican ballerino creates an uproar of harrowing consequences.

title: Unbelievable
description: As a traumatized young woman reports being raped by an intruder, she faces a whirlwind of emotions -- and increasingly skeptical questions from police.

title: Trial By Media
description: A man reveals his crush to a straight friend on "The Jenny Jones Show." Days later a murder occurs, leading to questions about the show's culpability.
